name: Douglas Odell
byline: Software developer, technology strategist, and team leader
intro: Well-rounded software developer with proficiency in React and TypeScript. 10+ years of experience as both a team leader and collaborator. Always striving to balance great UX with stakeholder needs and efficient development practices.

entries.title: Software Engineer
accomplishments: Engineered 30+ intuitive, responsive, and maintainable web apps for financial service professionals in collaboration with development team using React, JavaScript/jQuery, with .NET middleware

Created React component library of >25 UI elements used across 10+ apps and websites as part of corporate rebranding and code modernization effort, speeding up development time and streamlining code maintenance

Developed React, .NET, and REST API  based web form app and systems architecture to replace 185 legacy forms used by internal and external clients, reducing dependency on outdated technical stack while improving user and developer experience
Upgraded developer-maintained corporate website to a CMS-supported Jamstack platform, using GatsbyJS, GraphQL, Contentful, and Netlify, and Google Analytics integration
Integrated third party solutions into home-grown app ecosystem, including Google Analytics, SearchBlox, ServiceNow, and Cvent
Developed & designed industry-award-winning networking app for financial professionals in collaboration with development team
Improved user experience and created efficiencies in various CMS platforms, empowering content contributors to administer websites without requiring developer resources

entries.title: Supervisor, Web Development & UX
accomplishments: Managed, mentored, hired, trained, and professionally supported team of 5-10 developers of varying skill and experience levels
Led team through department restructuring while ensuring ongoing development and maintenance of several production apps
Improved processes for managing development support queue, reducing manual administrative tasks by 25%
Collaborated with cross-functional development teams as a contributor,  technical lead, and scrum master

entries.title: Freelance Web Developer
accomplishments: Designed and built brochure websites for small businesses using Wordpress, Wix, and Squarespace
Consulted with small business owners on user experience, design, and implementation of their websites

entries.title: Web Developer
accomplishments: Administered CMS and supported development for 10+ internal and external web apps and sites
Provided indispensable customer service to internal clients through a high-volume web request queue

items.name: CSS Frameworks (Bootstrap, Tailwind CSS, Material UI, Mantine UI)
